mosaics.title: By Brightness
mosaics.description: Sorted dark → light by mean pixel brightness — 9011 images

mosaics.description: Sorted by dominant hue angle (0°→360°, red→yellow→green→blue→violet) — 9011 images

mosaics.description: Sorted desaturated → vivid by mean saturation — 9011 images

mosaics.title: By Color Temperature
mosaics.description: Sorted warm → cool by estimated color temperature — 9011 images

mosaics.title: By Dominant Color
mosaics.description: Sorted by K-means primary cluster hue (HSV) — 9011 images

mosaics.title: By Contrast
mosaics.description: Sorted flat → punchy by contrast ratio — 9011 images

mosaics.title: By Sharpness
mosaics.description: Sorted soft → sharp by Laplacian blur score — 9011 images

mosaics.title: By Time of Day
mosaics.description: Grouped dawn → night (Gemini analysis) — midday: 2252, golden hour: 719, night: 2067, dusk/blue hour: 1
